overview:
Peter joined IRIS in March 2005 from Pivotal Corporation, a market-leading author of Customer Relationship Management systems across a broad range of industries.

Peter started his career as a software engineer with Smith Industries Aerospace and Defence, before moving onto specialist software vendors working on the provision of sales, marketing and customer service systems. Peter also worked for a business unit of the Royal Bank of Scotland as Development Manager for their internal systems.

Peter has over 20 years’ experience in the IT sector, focusing primarily on project management and IT governance. As CIO for IRIS, he is responsible for all aspects of the group’s internal information systems applications, development and information technology strategy.
